2025-0993
2025-12-19PMODepartment of Employment and Social Development ActAppointment of the Associate Deputy Minister of Employment and Social Development and designation as Deputy Minister of LabourAppointment of Robert Wright, of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Associate Deputy Minister of Employment and Social Development, to hold office during pleasure; and his designation as Deputy Minister of Labour, to hold office during pleasure, effective January 12, 2026.N/A
act: Department of Employment and Social Development Act
subject: Appointment of the Associate Deputy Minister of Employment and Social Development and designation as Deputy Minister of Labour
precis: Appointment of Robert Wright, of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Associate Deputy Minister of Employment and Social Development, to hold office during pleasure; and his designation as Deputy Minister of Labour, to hold office during pleasure, effective January 12, 2026.
